intro: After a long journey of self-discovery and growth, Azhar and Fathin finally met at the perfect timeâ€”when both were ready to begin a new chapter. Now, they embark on their wedding journey, not as the end of their love story, but as the beginning of a true adventure together.
breaking_news_content:
Hello! Because you are a precious part of our lives, we are delighted to invite you to our special dayâ€”we are getting married soon!

The wedding will be held intimately at Magelang with family and closest friends. We truly hope your presence will be part of this cherished moment.

Your prayers and blessings mean so much for the smoothness of the event and the new life we will begin together.

With love,

The bride & groom ðŸ’–

love_story.title: Episode 1: How We Met Each Other
love_story.description: Azhar and Fathin first crossed paths in 2022 at a community event, introduced by a mutual friend. Their initial meeting sparked a genuine curiosity and admiration for each other.

love_story.title: Episode 2: Building a Connection
love_story.description: As months passed, Azhar and Fathin found themselves drawn together by shared values, aspirations, and a growing sense of trust. Their friendship blossomed into a meaningful relationship.

love_story.title: Episode 3: A Promise for the Future
love_story.description: In early 2025, Azhar expressed his heartfelt intentions and proposed to Fathin. With joy and excitement, they embraced the promise of a future together.

love_story.title: Final Episode: The Beginning of Forever
love_story.description: On their wedding day, Azhar and Fathin celebrate the start of a new chapter, surrounded by loved ones. Their journey continues as they step into a life filled with hope and love.

reception.venue: Gedung Muhammadiyah, Bakalan, Muntilan, Kabupaten Magelang, Jawa Tengah

akad.venue: Gedung Muhammadiyah, Bakalan, Muntilan, Kabupaten Magelang, Jawa Tengah

address: Citran RT 1 RW 14, Donorojo, Mertoyudan, Kabupaten Magelang, Jawa Tengah 56553
